price: 25. Taigi Mes atleidome jam tai, ir, iš tiesų, jam artimas priėjimas prie Mūsų, ir gera (paskutinio) sugrįžimo vieta (Rojus).
arabic: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faghafarnā lahu dhālika wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
